definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: Lippi overlooks last summer's Confederations Cup, in which his team lost to Egypt and Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 里皮回想去在联合会杯上他的队伍输给埃及和巴西后。

sentences.english: Looking back, it was collective code ownership at its finest!
sentences.chinese: 现在回想起来，集体性的代码所有权非常有用。

sentences.english: I imagine my father’s expression remained stoic through it all.
sentences.chinese: 我回想父亲在当时游戏中的表情一直很坚定。

sentences.english: He is fond of retracing the experiences of his youth.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢回想少年时代的经历。

sentences.english: We might do except the recollection once years rolling like a stream safe.
sentences.chinese: 我们除了回想曾经的似水流年无事可做。

sentences.english: Instead, think back to the few times when you didn’t procrastinate. What was different?
sentences.chinese: 反过来，回想一下你没有拖沓的那几次，有什么不同？

sentences.english: Recall that the search engine crawls a large set of pages in a small timeframe.
sentences.chinese: 回想到搜索引擎在短时间内抓取大量的页面。

sentences.english: Think back to the first few years of Baidu.
sentences.chinese: 回想百度最初的那几年。

sentences.english: We can take a mental snapshot. When we play like this, we can score easy.
sentences.chinese: 脑子里回想一下比赛经过，这么打得分容易多了。

sentences.english: Think back, for example, to how we used to buy music.
sentences.chinese: 举例来说，回想我们以前是如何购买音乐唱片的呢。

sentences.english: While you are recapturing such an experience, let me raise my hand first.
sentences.chinese: 当你还在回想之际，让我举手扬声吧。

sentences.english: When I reflect on the first couple of years of Baidu's operation, I think there are three things that's very critical.
sentences.chinese: 当我回想百度最初的那几年，有三件事是非常重要的。

sentences.english: Think back to some of the requirements gathering exercises you've participated in.
sentences.chinese: 请回想一下您曾经参与过的一些需求收集活动。

sentences.english: Take apple to reread the former feeling letters, to remember the old sweet memories.
sentences.chinese: 花苹重读昔日的情信，回想旧日甜蜜回忆。

definition: to recall/to think of/to call to mind
to learn sth over again/to review/to brush up/to revive (memories, friendship etc)
to sigh with sorrow, regret etc/rueful/deeply moved
bit by bit/dribs and drabs/the little details/every aspect
to recollect/to recall (past times)/to look back
déjà vu (the experience of seeing exactly the same situation a second time)/seemingly familiar/apparently already acquainted
